 1997-14711997-10-090,  ,  NR,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (PART I) which (a) clarify what payments may be deducted by an employer in calculating the amount on which the employer is required to deduct or withhold tax, and (b) require tax withholding at a later date in certain cases.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1997-0470 Publication Date: 1997-10-29
